desc.en-US: Triggers when new data is received.
desc.zh-CN: 当接收到新的数据时触发流程。

noMoreSamplesMsg.en-US: Please configure your application with our generated webhook URL first and test again to have access to its data.
noMoreSamplesMsg.zh-CN: 请先使用我们生成的webhook地址配置您的应用程序，并再次测试以访问其数据。

desc.en-US: You need to copy the generated webhook URL to send requests to.
desc.zh-CN: 您需要复制生成的 Webhook 地址来向其发送请求。
